content: Excluding certain items, our non-GAAP net loss for the second quarter of 2022 was $12.3 million or $0.36 per diluted share. Looking at the results for the quarter, revenue for the second quarter of 2022 was $51.4 million, compared to $69.2 million for the same period in the prior year. For the second quarter 2022, Technology And Academic Services were $17.3 million, or 33.7% of revenue, compared to $18.1 million or 26.1% of revenue for the comparable prior year period. Counseling services and support for the second quarter of 2022 were $17.7 million, or 34.5% of revenue, compared to $23.2 million, or 33.5% of revenue for the comparable prior year period. Marketing and communication expenses for the second quarter of 2022 were $18.3 million, or 35.6% of revenue, compared to $21.7 million, or 31.4% of revenue, for the comparable prior year period. General and administrative expenses for the second quarter of 2022 were $7.8 million, or 15.3% of revenue, compared to $8.4 million, or 12.2% of revenue, for the comparable prior year period. The net gain on sale transactions during the second quarter of 2022, was $45.7 million, which included a gain on the sale of TutorMe of $51.5 million, offset by $5.8 million loss on the sale of the UAGC net assets. Our net loss for the second quarter of 2022 was $4.7 million, or a net loss of $0.14 per diluted share. Our non-GAAP net loss for the second quarter of 2022 was $12.3 million, or a loss of $0.36 per diluted share compared to the non-GAAP net loss of $0.8 million or a loss of $0.02 per diluted share for the second quarter of the prior year. The non-GAAP net loss for the second quarter of 2022 excludes, net gain on sale transactions of $45.7 million, legal expense of $0.9 million, restructuring and impairment charges of $35.9 million, acquisition costs of $0.5 million, and other non-GAAP costs of $0.8 million.
